content: how i knit the cc beanie this pattern was inspired by a cute acrylic seamed hat that my knitting friend & i saw many people wearing during the holidays being the yarn snobs that we are we wanted a hand-knit 100% wool version knit in the round we stared stared and stared some more put our heads together and came up with this pattern for the cc colorado chic beanie materials 200 yds worsted wool us #8 16 circulars and dpn s stitch marker gauge 4 5 5 stitches per inch cast on 88 stitches w/ long-tail cast on place marker & join in the round being careful not to twist stitches knit 4 1 x 1 rib on last row of ribbing turn hem under and pick up every other cast on stitch when doing the knit stitches of the rib body pattern k 3 row p 6 row k 3 row 1 x 1 rib 4 row repeat above 16 row 2 more times begin decreases 1 k9 k 2 decrease* 80 st k even row 2 10 3 *k8 k2tog* 72 st 5 *k7 k2tog* 64 st 7 *k6 k2tog* 56 st 9 *k5 k2tog* 48 st switch to dpn s 11 *k1 k2tog* 32 st 12 *k2 decrease* 16 st 13 *k2tog* 8st break off 10 yarn and pull through last 8 stitches to close hat tuck in any loose ends
